original_text: Just as people are destined to die once, and after that to face judgment,
korean_text: 한번 죽는 것은 사람에게 정해진 것이요 그 후에는 심판이 있으리니

sentences.original_text: Just as people are destined to die once
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 한 번 죽도록 정해진 것처럼

sentences.original_text: and after that to face judgment
